resources.string: No cliboard items to display. Copy text. Paste the text here, with the button bottom left.

Searching for an app to paste the text in your phone? It should no more be a burden. With "Copy-Paste", its easy to paste the text to and copy your saved texts in a single click. Delete it from the list, with long press if it is no useful.
Copy Paste to/from android app has never been easier. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aniXification.copypaste
Let us know about a bug or problem.
